Text:
Uhhh 1.43 gigs for this?!
As a DVD, this is okayish to good quality. It ain't the  worse, just a bit smudgey and not quite sharp when you go full screen. As a blu-ray, pretty fucking terrible quality.
This should be a 700 mb upload, 1.43 gigs for quality like this? Absurd.
